paper_abstract: This papers contains two results concerning random n x n Bernoulli matrices. First, we show that with probability tending to 1 the determinant has absolute value root n!exp(O(root n ln n)). Next, we prove a new upper bound 0.958(n) on the probability that the matrix is singular. (c) 2005 Wiley Periodicals, Inc.
paper_title: On random +/- 1 matrices: Singularity and determinant
